doc:
In order for this to work:,
(1) js libraries are required (in proper order) as dependencies on DBUI module: (a) tinymce, (b) angular-ui-tinymce 
(2) Angular module "ui.tinymce" must be added as external module dependency.  to DBUI module
(3) A fieldCustomization needs to be set for the sourcecode field:  {"uiSpec": "dbui.addon.tinymce_editor"}
